attributes.action: Change the England national anthem to ‘land of hope and glory’
attributes.background: I do not think that the national anthem of England should be the same as the national anthem of the United Kingdom, because I feel as a result England lacks identity.

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal or constitutional status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/Symbols/NationalAnthem.aspx
